issue.title: Fix scoop installation on Quake Documentation
issue.body: Currently, the link there is https://github.com/flyingpie/windows-terminal-quake/blob/master/scoop/windows-terminal-quake.json, but this won't work because it isn't raw. Change to https://raw.githubusercontent.com/flyingpie/windows-terminal-quake/master/scoop/windows-terminal-quake.json for it to work
